name: @smartface/materialtextbox
description: A marketplace component to overcome the quirks of [MaterialTextBox](http://ref.smartface.io/#!/api/UI.MaterialTextBox) to make it easier to use.

scripts.postinstall: if [[ ${AC_APPCIRCLE} != true ]]; then sfMarketplaceService import library --packageFolder $(pwd) --wsPath $SMF_CIDE_WS_PATH else true; fi;
